titles.title: To amend the District of Columbia Home Rule Act to permit the Council of the District of Columbia to impose a tax on the income of professional baseball players which is earned within the District of Columbia.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Government Reform.

bill.summary: 3/26/2003--Introduced. Amends the District of Columbia Home Rule Act to permit the Council of the District of Columbia to impose a tax on the income of professional baseball players which is earned within the District of Columbia.
